en.av_c2: Compare the smallest values in each list.
en.av_c3: Initially, we have the two sorted sublists in array A, and an empty temp array.
en.av_c4: Move everything from A to temp...
en.av_c4a: Move everything from A to temp, but reverse the values in the right array.
en.av_c5: Now we are ready to do the merge. First compare the smallest values in each list.
en.av_c6: The smaller value is 2 in the right list.
en.av_c7: Move it to position 0 of the A array.
en.av_c8: Continue in this way, at each step comparing the smallest values in each list.
